import axios from'axios';const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:5050/api';const api=axios.create({baseURL:API_BASE_URL,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});// Request interceptor
api.interceptors.request.use(config=>{return config;},error=>{return Promise.reject(error);});// Response interceptor

getUsers:function(){let page=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:1;let limit=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:10;let search=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:'';return api.get("/users?page=".concat(page,"&limit=").concat(limit,"&search=").concat(search));},// Get single user
